resources.string: We cannot connect to Iris Msg right now, please check your network connection and try again.
We use your phone number to check who you are. You will receive a 6 digit code to ensure you entered the correct number.
By tapping you are agreeing to our terms of use and privacy policy
An unknown error occurred, please try again.
Sorry, you cannot use this app unless you accept the permissions
Iris Msg lets you get your message out when you don\'t have enough SMS credit.
Your message is distributed between your invited donors using their data plan.
Donors can then choose to donate their SMS to forward on the message.
Subscribers receive the message like any other SMS.
For this to work we need your permission to send SMS on your behalf, see when they are sent and read your contacts so you can send invites.
Are you sure you want to stop this donation? If you change your mind, you will have to be invited again.
Failed to remove your donation, please try again
Update your app to get the latest features and fixes
An organisation is a group of donors and subscribers that you use to send messages through.
This name is not long enough
This info is not long enough
Are you sure you want to delete this organisation? This action cannot be undone
Are you sure you want to remove this member from your organisation?

Add a subscriber to your organisation to receive messages through your donor network. You MUST have their permission and consent to share their personal data (phone number) with the donors in your organisation. Donors will see their phone number when donating their SMS.

Add a donor to your organisation who can donate their unused SMS to forward along your messages. They MUST be someone you trust as they will be handling the personal data (phone numbers) of your subscribers.

Send a message to your organisation through it's donors. 

Donors will receive a notification where they have the option to forward the message on to subscribers. 

If a donor cannot donate, another donor will be asked instead.
These are your donors, they choose to donate their SMS to forward your messages.
These are your subscribers who receive the messages you send to this organisation.
Failed to delete organisation, please try again
Failed to remove member, please try again
Failed to add member, please try again
Failed to create message, please try again
You don\'t have any pending donations,\ngood work!
Your donations have been sent, thank you!
Warning: Foreign SMS (%1$s), carrier charges may apply.
Failed to donate messages, please try again

You have been invited to donate to %1$s on irismsg.io. This means you can donate your spare sms to forward messages for this organisation. \n\nWhen this organisation sends a message you will receive a notification to contribute towards delivering it. It will contain a suggested donation based on the number of donors the organisation has.
The url of where the api is
